description: Sample tactical maps for D&D 5e combat

maps.name: Forest Clearing
maps.description: A small clearing in a dense forest, perfect for an ambush or small skirmish.

maps.name: Tavern Interior
maps.description: The interior of a cozy tavern with tables, chairs, and a bar area.

maps.name: Dungeon Corridor
maps.description: A long, narrow dungeon corridor with alcoves and doorways.

maps.name: Village Square
maps.description: The central square of a small village with a well, market stalls, and surrounding buildings.

maps.name: Cave Entrance
maps.description: The entrance to a dark cave system with rocky terrain and scattered debris.
